subject: Baseball
Eyes and Eyesight
lead_paragraph: To help his eyes heal from conjunctivitis, Francisco Rodriguez is resurrecting the wraparound prescription glasses that look a little like goggles and it seems to be helping his pitching.
snippet: To help his eyes heal from conjunctivitis, Francisco Rodriguez is resurrecting the wraparound prescription glasses that look a little like goggles and it seems to be helping his pitching.
